subject: Tennis
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams became only the second woman to complete a career Golden Slam, winning the most lopsided women’s final in Olympic history by beating Maria Sharapova, 6-0, 6-1.
snippet: Serena Williams became only the second woman to complete a career Golden Slam, winning the most lopsided women’s final in Olympic history by beating Maria Sharapova, 6-0, 6-1.
